attributes.action: Remove Theresa May from her post as Home Secretary
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May, entrusted with the national security of the United Kingdom and ultimately responsible for the safety of it's citizens, did, at a time when her own office describes the threat from international terrorism as "substantial - a terrorist attack is a strong possibility", authorise and advocate a rolling reduction in security checks at the nations Borders allowing an unknown number of individuals linked to crime and terrorism to enter the Country undetected and without hindrance.

We say she has failed in her responsibilities and has presided over a systematic failure in national security that has undoubtedly compromised the safety of the United Kingdom irreparably.

ULTIMATELY, SHE SENT A MESSAGE TO THE UK BORDER AGENCY THAT IT IS ACCEPTABLE TO PRIORITISE EFFICIENCY OVER NATIONAL SECURITY
